title: "Slice: usage and internals" document has simple error.
body:
by **ralph.corderoy**: 
WRT https://plus.google.com/u/0/101406623878176903605/posts/1e6UmbXnSrR the document
http://golang.org/doc/articles/slices_usage_and_internals.html says «e[1] == 'm'» but
it should be a single "=" for assignment.
